properties.areaDesc: Waters from Florence to Cape Blanco OR from 10 to 60 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 3 at 2:19PM PST until January 6 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Medford OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, southwest winds 25 to 35 kt with
gusts up to 45 kt and very steep wind driven seas 13 to 17 feet.
For the Hazardous Seas Warning, very steep wind driven seas 14
to 16 feet expected. For the Small Craft Advisory, west to southwest
winds 10 to 20 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and seas 11 to 16 feet
at 13 seconds expected.

* WHERE...Gale conditions will affect all areas. Hazardous Seas
Warning conditions will affect most areas while Small Craft
Advisory conditions will affect only areas between 10 and 20 NM
between Cape Blanco Blanco and Cape Arago.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, until midnight PST tonight. For
the Hazardous Seas Warning, from midnight tonight to 10 PM PST
Saturday. For the Small Craft Advisory, from midnight tonight
to 4 PM PST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds and very steep seas could capsize or
damage vessels. Low visibility conditions are expected.

* View the hazard area in detail at
https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/mfr/HAZARD
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid strong winds and very steep
seas. Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or
secure the vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT PST TONIGHT... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 4 PM PST MONDAY... ...HAZARDOUS SEAS WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 10 PM PST SATURDAY
